OOC: This post should combine MOST of the active Maximals as I believe
near=
ly everyone was coming to the bay to reunite with those who had
just come b=
ack from the field. Feel free to post your characters as
coming in.

BIC:

=
LEGACY, SANTON and BUMP are the first three to make it to the Medbay
as the=
y pushed SILVERBOLT on the suspensor cart. They take him to the
critical ca=
re center which is in a sealed off section of bay itself,
leaving the rest =
of the Maximals to occupy the more normal sections.

The =93Normal=94 secti=
ons really only holds a few beds and a few CR
chambers, chambers which are =
designed for special cases =96 as most of
the standard CR chambers are in a=
 central section located more towards
engineering.

The room had several vi=
ew screens designed for diagnostic and medical
procedures, although they co=
uld easily be reconfigured for other uses
as well.

LEO PRIME, who for a Pr=
ime is actually smaller than most of the rest
of the Primes, only the size =
of a Mega rather than an Ultra like
TUSCON or RODIMUS, but he still command=
s a presence as he entered the
room.

WING SABER came in still helping TUSC=
ON to his medical bed.

LORD ELDER came walking soon after nodding a greeti=
ng to the others in
the room.

=93Let=92s get Tuscon hooked up to a feed tu=
be.=94 LEO said as he stepped
back and allowed ELDER to step in.

WING CALI=
BER turned to NIGHT SHIFT whenever he made it to the room.
=93Give me your =
device, I will have it display through the view screen.=94

(TAG)

Preston
=
